title: People Consultant (English, German)
description: People Operations strives to revolutionize human resources the same way that Google has revolutionized search. We are helping to find, grow and keep the remarkable assemblage of talent who are our Googlers.
key_qualifications: Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience. 7 years of experience as an HR Business Partner or HR Generalist providing consultations to the business on topics such as performance management, workplace concerns, etc. Experience in managing multiple stakeholders. Ability to communicate in English and German fluently to support local Googlers.
preferred_qualifications: Experience in HR with a Business Partner, Generalist, or consulting/legal background. Ability to organize and analyze data using HRIS systems for reporting. Excellent investigative, problem-solving and consulting skills.
responsibilities: Identify opportunities to improve Human Resources (HR) policies and propose solutions to improve inconsistent HR policies and gaps. Triage inquiries and connect employees to the right subject matter expert when necessary. Assist people partners with planning and roll-out of HR programs and initiatives. Advise on performance management issues and lead minor investigations and reorganizations. Provide HR support and consultation to the business, answering employee and manager queries about HR programs, policies and other HR-related topics.
